score.explanation: Connectivity is moderate but suffers from random dropouts. Potential causes include interference and network congestion.
score.trend_summary: Download speed has decreased. The number of visible networks has increased.

performance.interpretation: Currently suitable for HD streaming and light gaming. May struggle with multiple simultaneous connections.

problems: Excessive network congestion observed with 15 visible networks.
Interference from neighboring Wi-Fi networks is notable.
Random dropouts impact stability and connection quality.
fixes: Change the 2.4GHz channel to 1 or 6 to reduce interference.
Set the 5GHz channel to 149-161 for better performance.
Consider relocating the router to minimize blockage and interference.
Enable QoS to prioritize bandwidth for gaming.
Potentially upgrade to a dual-band or tri-band router.
router_steps: Log in to your router at http://10.0.0.1.
Navigate to Connection > Wi-Fi > Edit > 2.4GHz Channel and select channel 1 or 6.
Navigate to Connection > Wi-Fi > Edit > 5GHz Channel and select a channel between 149-161.
Consider repositioning the router for better signal distribution.
questions: Is your router placed in a central location away from obstructions?
